original_text: And it was told king Solomon that Joab was fled unto the tabernacle of the Lord; and, behold, he is by the altar. Then Solomon sent Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, saying, Go, fall upon him.
korean_text: 어떤 사람이 솔로몬 왕에게 아뢰되 요압이 여호와의 장막으로 도망하여 제단 곁에 있나이다 솔로몬이 여호야다의 아들 브나야를 보내며 이르되 너는 가서 그를 치라

sentences.original_text: And it was told king Solomon
that Joab was fled unto the tabernacle of the Lord
and, behold, he is by the altar
Then Solomon sent Benaiah the son of Jehoiada
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 솔로몬은 여호야다의 아들 베나야를 보내며
